Instruccion: Unscramble the letters. What's the vegetable?
Unscramble the words using a code. Code: use the alphabet backwards (Z=A, A=Z)

opciones: bad for your Sugar is teeth
respuestas: Sugar is bad for your teeth.

opciones: vegetables Eat every day and fruit
respuestas: Eat fruits and vegetables every day.

opciones: bow / tie / you / Do / want / a / ?
respuestas: Do you want a bow tie?

opciones: find / I / can't / my / barrettes / new / !
respuestas: I can't find my new barrettes!

opciones: life jacket / your / leave / Don't / on the ground.
respuestas: Don't leave your life jacket on the ground.

opciones: trash / in the ocean / throw / Don't
respuestas: Don't throw trash in the ocean.

opciones: in / Put it / the trash can.
respuestas: Put it in the trash can.

opciones: by the fire / Don't / the food / leave.
respuestas: Don't leave food by the fire.

opciones: the sausages / Put / the food box / in
respuestas: Put the sausages in the food box.

opciones: people / How many / in your family / there / are /?
respuestas: How many people are there in your family?

opciones: are / How many / there / children / in the class?
respuestas: How many children are there in the class?

opciones: there / many / How / in the bookcase / books / ? / are
respuestas: How many books are there in the bookcase?
